inclusion.criterion: treatment(s) with one or more appropriate AEDs at maximally tolerated doses
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least one seizure during the previous 6 months while at steady state on the currently used AED regimen
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ability to complete the Adverse Profile AEP questionnaire
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: not seizures during the previous 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: inability to complete the Adverse Profile AEP questionnaire
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He presented with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
